parameters.name: numblocks
parameters.description: Number of blocks of trials to test

parameters.name: repsperblock
parameters.description: Repetitions of each base level per block

parameters.name: resetthresh
parameters.description: Should the thresholds be reset to the median of the previous block threshold between each block?

parameters.name: prestime
parameters.description: Time in ms to present block before it disappears.  use -1 to prevent it from disappearing.

parameters.name: errorAdj
parameters.description: How much to adjust the dot threshold after an error (+1)

parameters.name: correctAdj
parameters.description: How much to adjust the dot threshold after correct.

parameters.name: fieldsize
parameters.description: Size in pixels of field square

parameters.name: border
parameters.description: Size in pixels of 'border', around field

parameters.name: useAudioFeedback
parameters.description: Whether audio feedback should be given.

parameters.name: responsetype
parameters.description: currently, changing this has no effect.
